messages.title: ONLY A VOTE FOR NICK TULLOCH CAN BEAT THE SNP HERE
messages.content: Only one vote can beat the SNP here in Inverness, Nairn, Badenoch & Strathspey – a vote for Scottish Conservative and Unionist candidate Nick Tulloch.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Attract investment to the Highlands and regenerate our high streets and town centres. We need to encourage businesses to start and develop and work with local councils to get the right level of quality, well-paid jobs.

To improve our local economy, we need a better bus network with more frequent services. Our roads need investment – temporary pothole repairs just don't work. In today's world, high speed broadband and mobile coverage is an essential service.
We need to protect our vital local hospital and GP services. SNP centralisation of emergency services needs reversed and brought back to where local knowledge is greatest.
We need properly funded schools with better facilities. We want schools that provide the right environment to our children to learn and enable them to pursue sport and other activities.

mentions.candidate: Nick Tulloch is Ruth Davidson's candidate.
mentions.tacticalSituation: Only a vote for Nick Tulloch can beat the SNP here.

issues.economy: Attract investment to the Highlands and regenerate our high streets and town centres. We need to encourage businesses to start and develop and work with local councils to get the right level of quality, well-paid jobs.
issues.education: We need properly funded schools with better facilities. We want schools that provide the right environment to our children to learn and enable them to pursue sport and other activities.
issues.health: We need to protect our vital local hospital and GP services. SNP centralisation of emergency services needs reversed and brought back to where local knowledge is greatest.
issues.transport: To improve our local economy, we need a better bus network with more frequent services. Our roads need investment – temporary pothole repairs just don't work. In today's world, high speed broadband and mobile coverage is an essential service.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am standing for election as I am no longer prepared to sit back and wait for somebody else to get things done. As a businessman in the region, I can offer a fresh and wide perspective approach and be easily accessible to you all. I will hold regular surgeries throughout the area.

politicalExperience.achievements: Offer a fresh and wide perspective; committed to holding regular surgeries throughout the area.

politicalExperience.role: Qualified lawyer with a firm of asset and wealth managers
politicalExperience.achievements: Determined to ensure the Highlands gets the best possible outcome from the forthcoming Brexit negotiations and to give strong voice within the UK Government.

contactInformation.address: Nick Tulloch, 2 Old Bar Road, Nairn IV12 5BX
